name: Battle It Out
description:
** NOTE: The 4th Gen iPod Touch is not supported***

MARINES NEVER QUIT!!! This we have proved time and again, this you will prove today. We do not prefer war but when it comes to our pride, we know how to BATTLE IT OUT.
Terrorists are striking every part of the world, your mission is to nip terrorism in the bud. You need to travel to different parts of the world to strike at the fountainheads of the world’s deadliest enemy groups.

MULTIPLAYER MODE WITH UNIQUE COMBO OF GUN COMBATS AND TANK BATTLES
Be a part of, never before, real time multiplayer mode packed with unique combo of explosive gun combats and thrilling tank battles. Kill your opponents either by capturing the tanks or demonstrating your skills with guns in multiplayer battles.

FORM YOUR PLATOON
You can Form your own PLATOON of friends or join PLATOON of your buddies to compete with other PLATOONS and PLAYERS in ongoing tournaments.

CHAT WITH PLATOON BUDDIES
Don't forget to use CHAT feature to make strategies with your platoon members or to invite other players to join your platoon.

FINISH THE JOB
Do not leave the job unfinished. This is a long war. Eliminate terrorists from all the locations by successfully carrying out more than 100 unique missions in SINGLE PLAYER mode. This is your chance to get promoted to the rank of GENERAL but only after getting rid of enemy sharp shooters, air borne terrorists, rocket firing opponents and other hurdles for which you were well trained.

KEEP FOCUS
Don't lose your focus by adverse weather conditions or stunning beauty of the fighting locations. Rainfall or snowfall, arid desert or snow clad mountains, keep focus and never let enemy go out of sight.

KEEP YOUR ARSENAL BATTLE FIT
Equip yourself with the right weapon at the right time. Use upgraded and advance assault rifles, sniper rifles, rocket launchers, tanks and air support to annihilate the enemies. Don't forget to safeguard yourselves with medical kits, armor and more!

Get geared Marine, it’s time to BATTLE IT OUT!!!!!
